about_the_game:
Scenez is where you find events, performances, and friends in one place. Virtual worlds are filled with music and entertainment beyond all boundaries. 4D Concerts take you on an exhilarating journey with Real-to-Life volumetric captured performances, offering a truly immersive experience with boundless perspective! Immerse yourself front-row, onstage, or even backstage in your favorite artist’s world!

- Explore artists' virtual worlds and enjoy live performances within.
- Play games and go on adventures with friends.
- Chat with friends via in-game video calling.
- Enjoy a concert or a comedy show in 4D.

Experience artist performances like never before with limitless perspective!

content_descriptors.notes: Musicians and comedians may have sensitive lyrics or content you may not agree with

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
